frame.name: Be_subset_of
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Part</fen> is considered to be a member of the set described by the <fen>Total</fen>. The relationship between <fen>Part</fen> and <fen>Total</fen> subset-superset rather than part-whole (as it is in the frames Part_whole and Including).
<ex><fex name="Part">Dr. Nelson</fex> <t>numbers</t> <fex name="Total">among the world?s foremost geotechnical engineering experts</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Part">Restaurant-Pizzeria Dante</fex> <t>counts</t> <fex name="Total">among the few restaurants of Florence where you can find good typical Tuscan and fish dishes and a first-class pizza</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Total
FE.definition:
<def-root>The complex multi-part entity of which a constituent <fen>Part</fen> is specified.
<ex>As a representative in Congress in the years 1783-85, Gerry <t>numbered</t> <fex name="Total">among those who had possessed talent as Revolutionary agitators and wartime leaders</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition:
<def-root>A subset of the <fen>Total</fen>.
<ex>Just be glad that <fex name="par">you</fex> number among the living.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the frequency with which the <fen>Part</fen> is included in the <fen>Total</fen>.
<ex>The sort of equipment that astronomers use to detect extrasolar objects <fex name="fre">often</fex> <t>counts</t> among the equipment found in any radio enthusiast's workshop.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Contrast_set
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates other totalities that the <fen>Part</fen> may also be a subset of.</def-root>

FE.name: Subregion
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the sub-location of the <fen>Total</fen> in which the <fen>Part</fen> is included. [MAY BE UNNECESSARY]</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The Explanation denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. </def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the inclusion event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> at which the subset relation holds.
<ex><fex name="tim">At that time</fex>, the factory <t>numbered</t> among the largest in the western half of North America.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> at which the subset relation holds.
<ex><fex name="pla">In Europe</fex>, the sport <t>counts</t> among the economic branches of industry which generate employment among the young people.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: number.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be a member a group.

lexUnit.name: count.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: be a member of a group.

lexUnit.name: among.prep
lexUnit.definition: COD: being a member or members of (a larger set).

lexUnit.name: subset.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a part of a larger group of related things.
